author: tosidrop
title: TosiDrop Cross-chain Development
description: Wide token distribution is fundamental for successful community-driven projects and decentralization. It is difficult, however, for projects to widely distribute tokens on both Cardano and Ergo.

f6_assessments.q0:
"Project Proposal is a token distribution platform on Cardano and Ergo that enables the widespread distribution of project tokens to their supporters and community members in a seamless manner.
However, for projects to widely distribute tokens on both platforms is not easy.
To resolve the backlog https://tosidrop.io
 has been built up"
f6_assessments.q1:
"
Well-defined development project roadmap that has worked through various categories as well as various airdrops on both cardano often fail. V1.3.1 has been developed on top of the platform however it would be better if there were two platforms that made one easy to complement the users of the platform two.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal addresses the challenges of collaboration tools & platforms and incentivize participation by building a platform for users to receive airdrops or claiming the tokens both in Cardano and Ergo blockchains. It will be a valuable platform for users in both blockchains to receive tokens from projects they have supported. This project can be used globally and there is high chance it will scale as more people using Cardano and Ergo blockchains. In fact, the team have already built a working platform on the Cardano blockchain. The team have stated the risk of running out of funds to complete the project. However, I believe the main risk is the security of the smart contracts they build on Cardano and Ergo. Since there were many hacks happening in the Ethereum, Binance and Solana blockchains, it is important to have solid security on the platform’s smart contracts for people to trust using this platform.
f6_assessments.q1: The team of developers are from Cardano SPOs who have been supporting and building on the Cardano ecosystem. They have the relevant experience to build for the Cardano and Ergo blockchains. However, they did not provide their full profile details of experience which makes it difficult to properly evaluate this proposal. The project timeline of 10 months stated in the proposal is achievable if the team are working together and putting this fulltime. The proposal stated they are a team of 8 and require $2,000/month over 10 months period. This requested budget is based on their project milestones in their timeline. There is not enough budget breakdown as it is based on like a salary based. The budget requested is reasonable if the team is working on this project full time. However, they are building on other projects which takes up their time and energy. This could impact the project delivery. Considering the team are working on other projects, the budget requested is considered high and not enough breakdown such as how many hours per week in a month to justify the $2,000/month which affects the scoring for this section. The team have already built a platform on Cardano and there is high chance that they will deliver for this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: The team have provided a brief way to audit them. However, it is not detailed enough and there are more ways to audit the team. Suggestions for the team to be better audited by the community are 1) metric for number of projects used their platform for airdropping tokens 2) no. of wallets used to claim the token from their platform 3) no. of return users/wallets using their platform 4) open source their coding and documents in github and/or google sheets and updating them constantly (the team already have a github) 5) having third parties to audit their smart contracts for security purpose 6) provide updates to the community weekly/bi-weekly/monthly on the progress of the development of their project with data via Twitter spaces, Youtube videos, Twitter or Discord announcements 7) engagement and activity between the team and the Cardano and Ergo communities.

f6_assessments.q0:
TosiDrop has offered a great platform to distribute tokens over the cardano blockchain. It is built on VMseal rudimentary website but surprisingly is very Quick and effective in delivering the tokens to their claimants. 
In addition they have offered airdrops to build the community. 
TosiDrop and Aneta team are intermingled and work to offer multiple cross chain links to (BTC, ERGO etc…). 
With the success of TosiDrop on cardano and the expansion to Ergo a cross chain platform is expanding. 
As cardano grows this cross chain expansion will allow users to transfer and move funds seamlessly through the various bridges and cross chain platforms. 
The essential use of cardano over multiple blockchains can be beneficial. 
This proposal answers the main challenge of offering cross chain products.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team behind TosiDrop has been in the cardano space for a while with various projects that are highly visible. 
The team worked on CNeta and also over on ERGO chain. 
TosiDrop milestones are well listed. It started with the already accomplished system that is currently active and running. 
The fund request covers porting TosiDrop to ergo. As a smart chain capable platform using eutxo the success is high since it has the same basis as cardano. Since the system has been reliable on cardano. And the team are capable and accomplished. The success of this project is highly likely. 
Also the timeline shows we are midway in the project milestones.
f6_assessments.q2:
The team has listed the milestones and clear scope of the project. 
The question that remains is if we can audit over the ergo platform. Since it is a public ledger it should be easy to ensure the project was delivered and tested. 
Based on the teams previous accomplishments and openness they are easily accessible and have potential to deliver a great product.

f6_assessments.q0: There is a lot of room for improvement in the Cardano ecosystem. I believe that cross-chain development can be a crucial step to furthering the growth of Cardano and it's ecosystem. Tosidrop and AnetaBTC have been doing very well in promoting this development across chains. Specifically with Cardano and Ergo. One of the ways they have done this is through airdrops to loyal Cardano and Ergo community members. This naturally leads to more creation of wallets on both blockchains, which leads to growth. In this proposal, the challenge is that there needs to be a greater need for cross-chain development and how the team strives to promote this. There is definitely room for improvement in cross-chain collaboration and with the potential funds from Fund9, Tosidrop can help bridging that gap. For these reasons, I give this section 4 out of 5 stars.
f6_assessments.q1: The team at Tosidrop is very experienced in many categories. They have done a great job in staying relevant and putting the community first. Promoting cross-chain development is very important to the beginning stages of the cardano ecosystem. Especially with interoperability being one of the three pillars of Cardano. We are in the scalability section of the Cardano roadmap, and tosidrop created this proposal to help support that idea. There is a detailed roadmap that describes what the team has accomplished so far, and what they plan to accomplish in the next year. Having this roadmap with general timeframes is really important because it gives the community something to look forward to, and suggests that the community will help them to stay accountable to their roadmap. The team has been open in the past, and it is likely that they will continue to be open with their community. For these reasons. I give this section 5 out of 5 stars.
f6_assessments.q2: There is a great deal of information in this proposal. It is very concise, and straight to the point, while remaining descriptive and articulate. I enjoyed reading through the detailed budget breakdown. It is a great visual on where the potential funds will be distributed and how that will help their proposal to be successful. It also describes how their project and the community will be benefited if the project is funded by promoting cross-chain development. This helps the project to remain focused on bringing decentralization to Cardano and Ergo and creating a platform where new users can benefit from their project and the loyal community that follows them. I believe that this information is sufficient to audit the progress of the proposal. Accountability will be a strong principle of ensuring that things are taken care of and are implemented in a way that will lead to the projects success. For these reasons, I give this section 5 stars.

f6_assessments.q0: The team is building a token distribution platform (called Tosidrop) on Cardano and Ergo. They are still working on Cardano.  Currently, there are two token distribution platforms established on Cardano. The first is Dripdropz but it just distributes tokens on Cardano. The second is Tosidrop. Tosidrop distributes tokens on Cardano and Ergo. Token distribution platforms will help to make the operation of projects on Cardano smoother. These are significant parts of Cardano.
f6_assessments.q1: The team is Tosidrop team. They are developers. Tosidrop platform is operated very well by them. I am using Tosidrop and I highly appreciate this platform. Because I'm using the Tosidrop platform, I get to know the members of Tosidrop very well. However, they also need to attach their information and LinkedIn. Their project is a long-term project and has the potential to expand in the future. Their road map is clearly planned. However, they need $2,000 per month for the maintenance and development of the platform. They will distribute tokens in both Cardano and Ergo Blockchains so they need a lot of money to make it. I believe they will develop their platform very well.
f6_assessments.q2: They have a plan for auditing and measuring the progress of the project. They plan for the risks and also have solutions to those risks. They should attach their social media links so that people can easily follow them. They should also have a target for the number of users of Tosidrop. Or, they should have a target for the number of tokens distributed through Tosidrop platform.

solution: TosiDrop is a token distribution platform on Cardano and Ergo that allows the wide distribution of project tokens to their supporters and community members in a seamless manner.
experience: We have already launched on Cardano's mainnet allowing thousands of users to claim project tokens such as cTOSI and cNETA, and have conducted several successful Ergo airdrops, most recently distributing our platform token eTOSI to 20k Ergo addresses.
